name: Roots 'n' Rabbits
description:
Roots 'n' Rabbits is a local coop game in which you must work together to help the rabbit reach the carrot! Grow roots which help your partner traverse the level, or play as the rabbit and use physics, teamwork and clever thinking to reach the goal!

This Game was made by:

Korbi (Developer) Jenny (Game Pitch, Game Design, Level Design, Artist) Kai (Lead Artist) Anjuscha (Artist) Lucas (Dev) Micha (Dev)

A big thanks goes to Game Dev Regensburg EV and their sponsor Cipsoft for hosting the on-site location!
